sentences.en: A corps of doctors arrived to inoculate the recruits.
sentences.cn: 一队医生来给新兵打防疫针.

sentences.en: All these troops passed under the command of the XIIIth Corps Headquarters.
sentences.cn: 所有这些部队都拨归第十三军司令部.

sentences.en: David McNeil is travelling with the White House press corps.
sentences.cn: 大卫·麦克尼尔正和白宫记者团一同前行。

sentences.en: Encouraging teacher transfer would not, by itself, integrate the teaching corps.
sentences.cn: 鼓励教师调动本身不会消弭教学队伍中的种族隔离。

sentences.en: He was a soldier of Marine Corps.
sentences.cn: 他曾是海军陆战队里的一名士兵.

sentences.en: My corps ! your corps ! our corps ! maring corps !
sentences.cn: 我的、你的、大家的海军陆战队！

sentences.en: She was plucked from the corps de ballet to take on Juliet.
sentences.cn: 她从芭蕾舞团的伴舞队中被挖掘出来，担任朱丽叶这一角色。

sentences.en: the commander of the third army corps
sentences.cn: 陆军第三军团的指挥官

sentences.en: The corps are [ is ] assembling near this town.
sentences.cn: 军团正在本城镇附近 集结.

sentences.en: The corps is assembling near this town.
sentences.cn: 军团正在本城镇附近集结。

sentences.en: The corps' corn in the corner is scorned by the stubborn corporation.
sentences.cn: 军团在角落里的谷物受到了顽固的公司司（社团）的嘲笑。

sentences.en: The medical corps were cited for bravery in combat.
sentences.cn: 医疗队由于在战场上的英勇表现而受嘉奖.

sentences.en: The morale of the corps had improved markedly since March 1.
sentences.cn: 自三月一日以后,该军之士气日益旺盛.

sentences.en: The press corps was primed to leap to the defense of the fired officials.
sentences.cn: 记者团获知信息后，立即声援被解雇官员。

sentences.en: The transport corps is ancillary to the infantry.
sentences.cn: 运输队是步兵的辅助部队.

sentences.en: the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers
West Coast Corps is a large corporation.
sentences.cn: 西海岸公司是个大型公司。

sentences.en: When the war broke out, he volunteered for the Marine Corps.
sentences.cn: 战争爆发时, 他自愿参加了海军陆战队.

words.tran_cn: 某种工作者的全体,团体

trans.tran_en: a group in an army with special duties and responsibilities
